> Can be configured with a canonicalizatio=
n rule like this:

>              <newObject name=3D"testing_canonicaliza=
tion" 
class=3D"org.archive.crawler.url.canonicalize.RegexRule">
>         =
         <boolean name=3D"enabled">true</boolean>
>                  <strin=
g name=3D"matching-regex">^
(.*index.php/topic,7413.0/?)(board=3D.*)$</stri=
ng>
>                  <string name=3D"format">${1}</string>
>             =
     <string name=3D"comment">removes board=3D.* from 
URI</string>
>      =
        </newObject>
> 
> Note that this will only prevents heritrix from c=
rawling all these URIs - 
the URIs written into the ARC file(s) will be the=
 original ones. 
> Another issues arises when you want to access such conte=
nt with 
software like the open source wayback. Either at index-time or loo=
kup 
time 
> (or both) you might want to apply the same canoicalization rul=
e.
